attributes.additional_details:
Xenon head lights have been shown in many international research paper to affect badly eye retina and cause catarct .
About 400,000 Britons are having Cataract surgery every year and the numbers are increasing dramatically with the increase of the number of cars fitted with Xenon headlights.
In addition, thousands of accidents on British roads are actually caused by the dazzling effect of Xenon head lights even though this cause is not researched and reported.
If Xenon head lights are left LOOSE on our roads, millions of Britons will be BLIND within a decade of being subjected to Xenon headlights.

SUPPORT a TOTAL BAN ON XENON HEAD LIGHTS.
